name: Alpha Run Club
description: Alpha Run Club welcomes runners of all abilities for weekly and monthly runs starting from Alpha Bottle Shop & Tap in Bedminster.

time.details: Meetup & bag drop from 6pm, ready to run at 6.30pm. A 5km loop around Bristol harbourside or Victoria Park during summer.

location.address: Alpha Bottle Shop & Tap, Unit 1, Imperial Arcade, Bedminster, Bristol, BS3 4HH

cost.details: Free to join, no sign up necessary.

time.details: Monthly 'PLOG' to jog and pick up litter in local areas. View the club Instagram page for confirmed dates.

location.address: Alpha Bottle Shop & Tap, Unit 1, Imperial Arcade, Bedminster, Bristol, BS3 4HH

cost.details: Free to join, no sign up necessary.
